1.5 Bed / 1 Bath in Bushwick, Brooklyn. All Pets Allowed. Nearby subway stations include: Myrtle Av. A stunning conversion of a 19th Century church nested in a prime Brooklyn location. Many different layouts available across three different buildings. All featuring; Airy loft layouts, new oak floors, GE appliances, central air and heat. Surrounded by convenient neighborhood amenities, galleries, restaurants, coffee shops and bars too. All of this an easy 15 minutes to downtown Manhattan via the J Express train. * Listed price is net effective of 6 weeks free rent *

Williamsburg, Brooklyn. Pets Upon Approval. Nearby subway stations include: Marcy Av, Metropolitan Av, Lorimer St. Spacious Charming 2 bedroom apartment in a classic pre-war building. Apartment features Hardwood floors, and modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances. Prime Williamsburg location close to JMZ, G, and L trains! Clean paint, and shiny floors. Don't sleep on this one. We can help you find roommates.
